original_title: EXO Planet #3 The EXO'rDIUM In Seoul
overview: EXO Planet #3 – The EXO'rDIUM was the third tour of South Korean-Chinese boy band EXO. This is a recording of the concert date of July 24th, 2016 at Seoul in the enclosure Olympic Park Gymnastics Stadium (better known as Olympic Gymnastics Arena and Olympic Gymnastics Hall).
title: EXO Planet #3 The EXO'rDIUM In Seoul
